string.value: You're now a Thief! Now what? Perhaps #b#p1052001##k can help you.
#p1052001# suggests monster hunting as a form of basic training. He wants you to hunt #r20 #o130100#s#k. #o130100#s can be easily found near #m103000000#. \n\n#o130100# #r#a21401##k
You eliminated 20 #o130100#s and reported that to #p1052001#. Piece of cake!

도적이 되었다고 무작정 강해지는 것은 아니지. 이제 겨우 초보자에서 벗어난 애송이 도적은 스스로의 힘으로 전투를 하기도 어려운 법. 특히 자네 같은 경우엔 더 한 것 같은데... 어때? 이 다크로드님의 특별 수련을 받아보겠나?
#L0# #b수련을 하겠습니다.#l 

#L1# 스스로의 힘으로 할 수 있습니다. #I
스스로의 한계도 인정할 줄 모르는 멍청이는 도적이 아니지...좋아. 자네에게 수련을 시켜주지.
알아서 할 수 있다고? 흐응... 그렇게 보이지 않는데. 뭐 수련을 받지 않겠다면 하는 수 없지만 말이야.

Being a Thief doesn't mean you are strong. You're just out of the beginner's level. It's hard for you to fight. You look even worse. Would you like to go for a special training by #p1052001#?
#L0# #bI want to be trained.#l 

#L1# I can do it by myself. #I
When you don't know who you are, you are no longer a Thief. Good. I'll show how to train yourself.
You can do it by yourself? Hmm..I don't think so, but I won't press you further...

I'm sure that you don't know how to use weapons. It's better to hunt #o130100#. You can do anything after you learn how to hunt. Go and hunt #r20 #o130100#s#k and let me know when you've finished. You can do it easily as #o130100#s are all around Kerning City.
You're not ready to be trained.
You came back with 20 #o130100#s. It's a piece of cake. Don't be happy with this. It is just first step.
I'll call you when you need another training session. Until we meet again...keep training hard!
You haven't eliminated #r20 #o130100#s#k yet? Sigh, hurry up.
